snippet: Merritt shot a 10-under-par 61 on Friday to tie the course record at the RBC Heritage in Hilton Head Island, S.C.
abstract: Troy Merritt shoots 10-under-par 61 to tie course record at RBC Heritage in Hilton Head Island, SC.
lead_paragraph: Merritt shot a 10-under-par 61 on Friday to tie the course record at the RBC Heritage in Hilton Head Island, S.C.

headline.main: Troy Merritt Ties Course Record at RBC
